contracts/feature_token/FeatureToken.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

pragma solidity ^0.8.2;


/**
 * @dev This is a sample contract that combines a lot of features.
 * This contract and its dependencies serve to demonstrate how those features work
 * and how they are implemented.
 * Features include:
 * - ERC20 and DEX / Pancakeswap
 *      - Adding and removing liquidity from a DEX
 *      - Selling and buying tokens from a DEX
 *      - Enabling and disabling those functions
 * - Context
 * - Ownable
 * - Pausable
 * - Whitelist / Blacklist
 * - Mint and Burn
 * - Taxes (also add to DEX LP)
 * - Dividends (also in combination with a DEX)
 * - Reflections
 * - Timers
 * - Vesting
 * - Payment Splitting?
 * - Voting
 * - Roles
 * - NFTs
 * - Blind Auction
 * - Permission to third parties
 * - Flash Minting
 * - Snapshots
 * - Upgradable
 * - Cross chain
 */
contract FeatureToken {
}

documentation.text:
@dev This is a sample contract that combines a lot of features.
 This contract and its dependencies serve to demonstrate how those features work
 and how they are implemented.
 Features include:
 - ERC20 and DEX / Pancakeswap
      - Adding and removing liquidity from a DEX
      - Selling and buying tokens from a DEX
      - Enabling and disabling those functions
 - Context
 - Ownable
 - Pausable
 - Whitelist / Blacklist
 - Mint and Burn
 - Taxes (also add to DEX LP)
 - Dividends (also in combination with a DEX)
 - Reflections
 - Timers
 - Vesting
 - Payment Splitting?
 - Voting
 - Roles
 - NFTs
 - Blind Auction
 - Permission to third parties
 - Flash Minting
 - Snapshots
 - Upgradable
 - Cross chain
